results.definition: come to see in an official or professional capacity
examples: The grant administrator visited the laboratory

results.definition: go to certain places as for sightseeing
go to see a place, as for entertainment
talk socially without exchanging too much information

examples: The principal visited his rage on the students

results.definition: a temporary stay (e.g., as a guest)
a meeting arranged by the visitor to see someone (such as a doctor or lawyer) for treatment or advice
examples: he scheduled a visit to the dentist
He was visited with a terrible illness that killed him quickly
Every summer, we visited our relatives in the country for a month

results.definition: the act of going to see some person in a professional capacity
the act of going to see some person or place or thing for a short time
examples: he dropped by for a visit

results.definition: the act of visiting in an official capacity (as for an inspection)
